content: अर्हत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अर्ह-शतृ] {@--1@} Worthy, deserving, deserving respect, respectable, adorable; <ls>Ś. 5. 15</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 25</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 55</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 56</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 128.</ls> {@--2@} Praised, celebrated (स्तुत, ख्यात). {@--3@} Worthy of, deserving, entitled to (mostly <ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A Buddha; the highest rank in Buddhist hierarchy. {@--2@} A superior divinity with the Jainas; सर्वज्ञो जितरागादिदोषस्त्रैलोक्यपूजितः . यथास्थितार्थवादी च देवोर्हन् परमेश्वरः .; see the word जैन also.
